entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:02 a.m. EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of showers near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
